Verses: 1 idho, Raakkaalangalil Karththarudaiya Aalayaththil Nirkum Karththarin Oozhiyakkaarare, Neengalellaarum Karththarai Sthoththiriyungal.
2 ungal Kaigalaip Parisuththa Sthalaththirku Neraaga Eduththu, Karththarai Sthoththiriyungal.
3 vaanaththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Undaakkina Karththar Seeyonilirundhu Unnai Aaseervadhippaaraaga.
